name: Scenario and System State Machine
definition:
PREFIX artifact: <http://holons-hub.com/collab/artifact/>
PREFIX xowl: <http://xowl.org/infra/denotation/schema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX kernel: <http://xowl.org/platform/schemas/kernel#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX syseng: <http://holons-hub.com/collab/schemas/syseng#>
BASE <http://holons-hub.com/collab/artifact/>
RULE DISTINCT <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency/constraint#10F595C400288F91D5A6E1B1C20A2D0F4ED2FA43> {
GRAPH ?g1 {
    ?scenario rdf:type syseng:Scenario .
    ?scenario syseng:contains ?system .
    ?scenario kernel:name ?scenarioName .
}
GRAPH ?g2 {
    ?scenario syseng:first ?message .
}
GRAPH ?g3 {
    ?system rdf:type syseng:System .
    ?system syseng:hasBehavior ?behavior .
    ?system kernel:name ?systemName .
    ?behavior syseng:initState ?init .
}
}
WITH (nil? (finalState system message init))
=> {
    ?e <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#Inconsistency> .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#message> "The scenario ?scenarioName is not consistent with the behavior of system ?systemName (initial state is ?init)." .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#producedBy> <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency/constraint#10F595C400288F91D5A6E1B1C20A2D0F4ED2FA43> .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_scenario> ?scenario .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_g1> ?g1 .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_system> ?system .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_scenarioName> ?scenarioName .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_message> ?message .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_g2> ?g2 .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_g3> ?g3 .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_behavior> ?behavior .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_systemName> ?systemName .
    ?e <http://xowl.org/platform/services/consistency#antecedent_init> ?init .
}
